stripped_text: When you install Net-Ready Eyes, suffer 2 meat damage. Whenever you initiate a run, choose an icebreaker. That icebreaker has +1 strength for the remainder of the run.
text: When you install Net-Ready Eyes, suffer 2 meat damage. Whenever you initiate a run, choose an icebreaker. That icebreaker has +1 strength for the remainder of the run.
title: Net-Ready Eyes
